summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkateBay eBay listing manager MVP. All core functionality working perfectly including login, dashboard, new draft wizard, LLM generation, and draft editor.

Settings page load and eBay connection status

All UI elements clickable and responsive
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (9/9 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (file upload not fully testable in automation)
